description: 80% of candidates getting jobs are “referred” which means... it’s all about who you know! In this class you’ll learn how to find and get to know the right people. You’ll also learn how to always be networking and continue to grow the network you already have. Relationships are the currency of life! And it’s important to constantly be growing your network throughout your career even if you aren’t job searching. Take this class and find out who you need to know!
title: Grow Your Network
